biotools.summary:
A method utilizing deep cycle transfer learning (DCTL) in order to detect apicomplexan parasites, by utilizing deep learning-based microscopic image analysis. DCTL is based on observations of parasitologists that Toxoplasma is banana-shaped, Plasmodium is generally ring-shaped, and Babesia is typically pear-shaped.

Parasitologist-level classification of apicomplexan parasites and host cell with deep cycle transfer learning (DCTL).
